name: Magnolia Sky Couriers
description:
Magnolia Sky Couriers

Entry for #Myfirstgamejam

Magnolia Sky Couriers is a strategy simulation game where you take control of a airship crew delivering cargo, fighting off hostiles while keeping your ship and cargo intact!

  • Game Design and Art done by me (First time attempt on art creation, experimenting on the concept genre for the first time as well)
  • Programming done by SoulRavel and aldeigia (First time attempt on Unity Engine)
  • Credits are in-game except music:
  • http://www.playonloop.com/2012-music-loops/moving-... (moving-around BG, CC 3.0)
  • http://www.downloadfreesound.com/8-bit-sound-effec... (Explosion FX)

The game is playable, but still remains experimental in terms of concept. We hope you enjoy playing the game!

Features:
  • 1 playable level.
  • Difficulty settings which amps the challenge!
